definition: precious mineral deposits/hidden treasure/(fig.) treasure/(Buddhism) the treasure of Buddha's law
to conceal/to hide away/to harbor/to store/to collect

sentences.english: He told me that under each cross is buried treasure.
sentences.chinese: 他告诉我每一个交叉点处都有埋藏的宝藏。

sentences.english: Some of the first batch of imperial treasures being transfered, 1937.
sentences.chinese: 1937年，首批帝王宝藏中的一些被转运。

sentences.english: These faithful guardians seemed unwilling to surrender their treasure .
sentences.chinese: 这些忠实的守卫者似乎不愿交出他们的宝藏。

sentences.english: A nicked pearl opens a treasure of innovation.
sentences.chinese: 一个拨开的珍珠蚌打开了创新的宝藏。

sentences.english: He decided to search for it in the land of the Minimoys and try to save the day.
sentences.chinese: 他决定到毫发人的国度寻找宝藏，试图拯救家园。

sentences.english: But what about the four - and - a -half- ton treasure that is said to be on board ?
sentences.chinese: 但那笔据说在船上的四吨半宝藏的下落呢？

sentences.english: On the flourishing land, we turn the tears we had on the way into the treasure-trove.
sentences.chinese: 在繁华的岸上，把沿途的泪光，都埋成了宝藏。

sentences.english: Coral reefs are troves of the sea.
Quaker Oatmeal contains dinosaur eggs and other hidden treasures.
sentences.chinese: 燕麦有恐龙蛋和其他神秘的宝藏。

sentences.english: But Chan guides me inside to his real treasures.
sentences.chinese: 不过，成龙引我到里面看他真正的宝藏。

sentences.english: Which year, which month, only then can take back that inexhaustible buried treasure?
sentences.chinese: 哪年，哪月，才能够收回那无尽的宝藏？

sentences.english: Chong Shansi cultural treasures of the great characteristics, but also very valuable.
sentences.chinese: 崇善寺的文物宝藏很有特色，也很珍贵。

sentences.english: On the execution ground, gowardesh chip finally won the vitality for the treasure.
sentences.chinese: 刑场上，狗娃以宝藏为筹码终于获得了生机。

sentences.english: Every one deservers an opportunity to get the treasure, which only depends on whether you take actions or not.
sentences.chinese: 每个人都有得到宝藏机会，就看你是否有付出行动。

sentences.english: In man’s search for mineral wealth, many enormous holes have been dug.
sentences.chinese: 在人类搜寻矿石宝藏的旅程中，挖掘了大量庞然大洞。

definition: treasure-house/treasury/treasure-trove (often fig., book of treasured wisdom)
underground palace (as part of imperial tomb)
